doc.title: To the Hills: 24 Independent Short Films

credit.role: 3 Businessmen/Basket Ball Palyers and Commentators/Secret Agent Delgado/Fingers/Drawing Hands/Wig Salesman/Golfer/How Drive the Car Guy/Criminal/Filmmaker/Singer-Songwriter/Instructor/Yoga-dancer/Writer/Thinker/Jogger/Astronaut/Movie Fan

doc.plot: Lot of ambitious, crazy characters show how to follow their schemes to become rich and famous. A wig salesman tries to get ahead with new wig technology such as "air conduction" and "stainless steel clamps". A yoga specialist incorporates modern dance moves and ridiculous nose breathing. And Secret Agent Delgado "puts the word DISCIPLINE back into interior decorating and home garden design." And there are a lot more characters where those came from.
